characterDescription:
Kmakl is the consort of Queen Fen of Thaylenah. He is attended by two ardents as scribes.
On Dalinar's and Navani's tour of the damaged Thaylen City, Kmakl's job is to stand behind Fen and - whenever she says something he thinks significant - nod for her scribes to record it in the official histories.

characterDetails.Appearance: He is described as being an aging man with matching mustaches and eyebrows, both drooping down to frame his face, and he wears a vest and cap.
